title.en: OpenAI Releases GPT-5 Preview with 50% Performance Improvement

summary.zh: OpenAI在今日发布了GPT-5的预览版本，新模型在推理能力、创意写作和代码生成方面都有显著提升。据内部测试显示，GPT-5在各项基准测试中的表现比GPT-4提升了约50%。
summary.en: OpenAI today released a preview version of GPT-5, with significant improvements in reasoning, creative writing, and code generation. Internal tests show that GPT-5's performance in various benchmarks is approximately 50% better than GPT-4.

zh.title: OpenAI发布GPT-5预览版，性能提升50%
zh.summary: OpenAI在今日发布了GPT-5的预览版本，新模型在推理能力、创意写作和代码生成方面都有显著提升。据内部测试显示，GPT-5在各项基准测试中的表现比GPT-4提升了约50%。

en.title: OpenAI Releases GPT-5 Preview with 50% Performance Improvement
en.summary: OpenAI today released a preview version of GPT-5, with significant improvements in reasoning, creative writing, and code generation. Internal tests show that GPT-5's performance in various benchmarks is approximately 50% better than GPT-4.

title.zh: 谷歌Gemini Ultra在医疗诊断领域取得突破
title.en: Google's Gemini Ultra Achieves Breakthrough in Medical Diagnosis

summary.zh: 谷歌最新的Gemini Ultra模型在医疗影像分析方面表现出色，能够准确识别早期癌症病变，准确率达到96.7%。这一突破有望革命性地改变医疗诊断领域。
summary.en: Google's latest Gemini Ultra model excels in medical image analysis, accurately identifying early-stage cancer lesions with an accuracy rate of 96.7%. This breakthrough promises to revolutionize the field of medical diagnosis.

zh.title: 谷歌Gemini Ultra在医疗诊断领域取得突破
zh.summary: 谷歌最新的Gemini Ultra模型在医疗影像分析方面表现出色，能够准确识别早期癌症病变，准确率达到96.7%。这一突破有望革命性地改变医疗诊断领域。

en.title: Google's Gemini Ultra Achieves Breakthrough in Medical Diagnosis
en.summary: Google's latest Gemini Ultra model excels in medical image analysis, accurately identifying early-stage cancer lesions with an accuracy rate of 96.7%. This breakthrough promises to revolutionize the field of medical diagnosis.

title.zh: 自动驾驶汽车在城市测试中达到新里程碑
title.en: Autonomous Vehicles Reach New Milestone in Urban Testing

summary.zh: 特斯拉FSD系统在复杂城市环境中完成了10万公里无人工干预驾驶测试，标志着自动驾驶技术迈向商业化应用的重要一步。
summary.en: Tesla's FSD system has completed 100,000 kilometers of driverless testing in complex urban environments without human intervention, marking a significant step towards the commercial application of autonomous driving technology.

zh.title: 自动驾驶汽车在城市测试中达到新里程碑
zh.summary: 特斯拉FSD系统在复杂城市环境中完成了10万公里无人工干预驾驶测试，标志着自动驾驶技术迈向商业化应用的重要一步。

en.title: Autonomous Vehicles Reach New Milestone in Urban Testing
en.summary: Tesla's FSD system has completed 100,000 kilometers of driverless testing in complex urban environments without human intervention, marking a significant step towards the commercial application of autonomous driving technology.

title.en: AI Chip Market Expected to Grow 40% in 2025

summary.zh: 根据最新市场报告，全球AI芯片市场预计在2025年将达到650亿美元，同比增长40%。NVIDIA、AMD和英特尔等公司正在加大投资力度。
summary.en: According to the latest market report, the global AI chip market is expected to reach $65 billion in 2025, with rapid year-on-year growth. Companies like NVIDIA, AMD, and Intel are increasing their investments.

zh.title: AI芯片市场预计2025年增长40%
zh.summary: 根据最新市场报告，全球AI芯片市场预计在2025年将达到650亿美元，同比增长40%。NVIDIA、AMD和英特尔等公司正在加大投资力度。

title.zh: 机器学习在气候预测中的新应用
title.en: New Applications of Machine Learning in Climate Prediction

summary.zh: 科学家们利用深度学习技术开发了新的气候模型，能够更准确地预测极端天气事件。该模型在过去一年的测试中准确率达到89%。
summary.en: Scientists have developed a new climate model using deep learning technology that can more accurately predict extreme weather events. The model achieved an accuracy rate of 89% during testing over the past year.

zh.title: 机器学习在气候预测中的新应用

en.title: New Applications of Machine Learning in Climate Prediction
en.summary: Scientists have developed a new climate model using deep learning technology that can more accurately predict extreme weather events. The model achieved an accuracy rate of 89% during testing over the past year.
